ac: 33, touch 20, flat-footed 21 (+11 Dex, +1 dodge, +13 natural, -2 size)
special_attacks: create vacuum, elevated ejection, fast swallow, mythic power (5/day, surge +1d8), swallow whole (2d8+9 bludgeoning damage, AC 14, 20 hp, DR 10/-), whirlwind (at will, 10-60 ft. high, 2d8+9 damage, DC 27)
feats: Blind-Fight, CleaveM, Combat Reflexes, Dodge, Flyby Attack, Improved InitiativeB, Iron WillM, Mobility, Power Attack, Weapon FinesseB, M
description: This living tornado draws in all the air that surrounds it, hurling unrestrained objects as it moves.

sections.body: Airborne creatures take a –1 penalty on attack and damage rolls against a mythic air elemental.
sections.name: Air Mastery

sections.body: As a standard action, a mythic elder air elemental can suck the air out of the lungs of creatures it has swallowed or that are trapped in its whirlwind (Fortitude DC 27 negates). Creatures that fail the save take 2d6 points of damage and must attempt Constitution checks each round as if they had run out of breath. An affected character can't speak, use breath weapons, cast spells with verbal components, or do anything else that requires breathing. A trapped creature that succeeds at its save must succeed at a concentration check to cast spells. The air elemental can maintain this vacuum as a move action. If it stops, the trapped or swallowed creatures can breathe again. The save DC is Strength-based.
sections.name: Create Vacuum

sections.body: When a mythic air elemental in whirlwind form ejects a trapped creature, it can do so from any point up to the whirlwind's current height, dropping the creature into the whirlwind's space or within the elemental's normal reach. The creature takes falling damage as normal. If the elemental expends one use of mythic power, it can instead throw a trapped creature as if using the uncanny grapple path ability with no grapple check needed.
sections.name: Elevated Ejection

sections.body: A mythic air elemental can use this ability on a creature it has grabbed. If a trapped creature cuts itself free, the hole heals itself closed at the start of the elemental's next turn, allowing it to use swallow whole again.
sections.name: Swallow Whole

sections.body: A mythic elder air elemental is pure fury and strength, capable of throwing wooden splinters through stone walls and tearing creatures apart with fists of solid wind. Its greatest speed is within its empty core, able to suffocate enemies in moments.

name: Elemental, Air, Mythic
skills: Acrobatics +30, Escape Artist +30, Fly +34, Knowledge (planes) +20, Perception +20, Sense Motive +20, Stealth +22
